level.text: A defective instant ticket is a ticket which is partially or wholly blank, distorted, misregistered, miscut, printed or produced in error, or a ticket from which the protective covering is removed or is not intact.
The sole and exclusive remedy for a defective ticket shall be replacement with a ticket for the same game or a refund.
No defective on-line ticket(s) shall be replaced after the draw break for the draw date printed on the ticket.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
